title: 08/18/2021 DPS Hour 3 Silly Stories and NFL Hot Seats
itunes:title: 08/18/2021 DPS Hour 3 Silly Stories and NFL Hot Seats
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress, in for Dan, react to a number of silly stories including Jae Crowder caught slipping into the DM's and Max Scherzer not wanting to be slapped on the butt. The guys discuss which NFL Coaches are on the hot seat this season and fans brawling in the stands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
